problem_text_cn: 如图,PA、PB切⊙O于点A、B,CD是⊙O的切线,交PA、PB于C、D两点,△PCD的周长是36,则AP的长为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, PA and PB tangent ⊙O at vertices A and B, and CD is the tangent of ⊙O, crossing PA and PB at C and D, the perimeter of △PCD is N_0, then the length of AP is ()
raw_answer: 解:∵PA、PB分别是⊙O的切线,且切点为A、B；∴PA=PB；同理,可得:DE=DA,CE=CB；则△PCD的周长=PD+DE+CE+PC=PD+DA+PC+CB=PA+PB=36,∴PA=PB=18,故选:B．
raw_comment: 此题主要考查了切线长定理的应用,能够将△PCD的周长转换为切线PA、PB的长是解答此题的关键．
